sentences.en: Any of numerous small fishes of the family Cyprinodontidae, including the guppy and mosquito fish, inhabiting chiefly fresh and brackish waters in warm regions.
sentences.cn: 鳉鱼属于鳉科的许多种小型鱼，包括虹鳉和蚊鱼，主要栖居在温暖地带的淡水和咸水中。

sentences.en: Are brackish with the salt of human tears!
sentences.cn: 是人类眼泪中的盐分所渍咸!

sentences.en: Brackish macroeconomics flowed from universities into central banks.
sentences.cn: 半咸宏观经济从大学流传到央行.

sentences.en: Brackish waters generally support only a small range of faunas.
sentences.cn: 咸水水域通常只能存活为数不多的几种动物。

sentences.en: But the brackish consensus also seems to leave students cold.
sentences.cn: 但半咸共识似乎也把学生们排除在外.

sentences.en: Cypresses, with their tolerance for brackish water, thrive in these ecosystems.
sentences.cn: 柏树, 与它们的容忍苦咸水, 蓬勃发展,在这些生态系统.

sentences.en: He nods while he pours me a pint of brackish ale.
sentences.cn: 他一边点头一边给我倒了一杯啤酒.

sentences.en: Israel extracts about 65% of the upper Jordan , leaving the occupied West Bank dependent on a brackish trickle and a mountain aquifer , access to which Israel also controls .
sentences.cn: 以色列提取出约旦河上游约65%的水源，使供水中的约旦河西岸依赖于一条咸水细流和山脉地下蓄水层，其入口仍为以色列控制。

sentences.en: No food and what there is, brackish and foul.
sentences.cn: 船上食品断绝,淡水也即将消耗尽, 只有咸湿和恶臭的气息到处弥散.

sentences.en: Principal application of reverse osmosis has been in desalting brackish waters for domestic consumption.
sentences.cn: 反渗透主要应用于生活用含盐水的脱盐.

sentences.en: The Baltic Sea is the largest brackish water basin in the world.
sentences.cn: 波罗的海是世界上最大的微咸水盆地.

sentences.en: The dialysis principle can be used for demineralization of brackish water.
sentences.cn: 渗析原理的应用是除半咸水中的盐.

sentences.en: The factory has several shallow pools of brackish water.
sentences.cn: 工厂有几个浅的咸水池。

sentences.en: There are about 45.000 species of chordates, occupying marine, fresh and brackish water and terrestrial habitats.
sentences.cn: 有大约45.000种脊索动物,它们占据着海 、 淡水或淡咸水和陆地的生态环境.

sentences.en: This kind of operation works best in brackish water.
sentences.cn: 这种生产方法最宜于微咸水.

sentences.en: This pickled vegetables fresh color, flavor through, brackish palatability and pleasant fragrance.
sentences.cn: 这种腌制菜色泽鲜嫩 、 香味透人 、 咸淡适口、清香宜人.

sentences.en: Thriving on sunlight and CO 2, algae can be grown in fresh or brackish water.
sentences.cn: 只要有充足的阳光和二氧化碳, 海藻就可以在淡水或海水中生长.

words.tran_cn: 含盐的；令人不快的；难吃的

phrases.tran_cn: 苦咸水（碱性水）；微咸水；半咸水；淡盐水（盐分界于河海水之间）

trans.tran_en: brackish water is not pure because it is slightly salty
